description.content:
Postman collection generated from TC-API-001â€¦010.

How to use:
1) Create an Environment and set baseUrl = https://api.demoblaze.com
2) Run folder '00 - Setup' once (it sets timestamp/username/password, cookies)
3) Run folders in order.

Notes:
- DemoBlaze responses are not strictly RESTful; tests focus on status=200 + body rules.
- Field names in responses can vary (sometimes wrapped). Scripts try common shapes.

values.value: cat, desc, id, img, price, title
